item.title: NYT Admits Biden Was Never Qualified For Second Term After Downplaying Concerns For Years
item.description: Now that the election is over, The Times no longer has to cover for a failing president.

item.title: Mike Johnson’s Omnibus Resuscitates State Department Group That Censored The Federalist
item.description: The group has helped Big Tech engage in industrial-scale censorship against conservatives.

item.title: Mike Johnson’s Latest Spending Scheme Proves He’s Democrats’ Useful Idiot
item.description: Mike Johnson is a pathetic excuse for a Republican who has no business being speaker, let alone a congressman.

item.title: Report: Your Bank Might Be Spying On You For The Feds
item.description: Americans should be deeply concerned that our government and financial institutions are not only spying on us but also potentially abusing their power...

item.title: Americans Overwhelmingly Support MAHA, RFK’s Plans To Reform The Food Industry
item.description: Americans are overwhelmingly behind major pillars of Robert F. Kennedy Jr.'s proposals to reform the food industry as secretary of HHS.
